name: Ext_R4B_AllergyIntolerance_type
title: Cross-version Extension for R4B.AllergyIntolerance.type for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents AllergyIntolerance.type from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/AllergyIntolerance|4.3.0 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: Identification of the underlying physiological mechanism for the reaction risk.
element.comment: `AllergyIntolerance.type` maps to R5 `AllergyIntolerance.type`. Has no type mapping `type` removed the required value set binding to `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/allergy-intolerance-type|4.3.0`. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: Identification of the underlying physiological mechanism for the reaction risk.
element.comment: `AllergyIntolerance.type` maps to R5 `AllergyIntolerance.type`. Has no type mapping `type` removed the required value set binding to `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/allergy-intolerance-type|4.3.0`. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: Identification of the underlying physiological mechanism for a Reaction Risk.
